mapper.sql: SELECT a.auction_id, a.members_id, m.name, a.title, a.sales_time, a.deadline, a.contents, a.file, a.tag, a.online FROM auction AS a JOIN members AS m ON a.members_id = m.members_id
mapper.select: WHERE a.sales_time > NOW() ORDER BY a.sales_time DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction (members_id,title, sales_time,deadline,contents,file,tag, online) VALUES(#{membersId},#{title}, STR_TO_DATE(#{sales_time}, '%Y-%m-%d'),#{deadline},#{contents},#{file},#{tag}, ${online})
